metaTags.metaDescription: Stay ahead of the latest in security, performance, and innovation with Cloudflare's events hub. Explore upcoming conferences, webinars, and exclusive industry summits—all in one place. Join thought leaders, gain expert insights, and connect with the global community driving the future of the internet

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Connect 2025 Las Vegas
relatedBlades.subtitle: October 13 — 16
relatedBlades.copy: Elevate your experience with the power of the connectivity cloud. Put the connectivity cloud to work for you at our annual conference. Join us for a transformative experience you won't want to miss!

leftHalf.title: Connect 2025 London
leftHalf.copy:
### __April 10__

Unlock the power of the connectivity cloud. Join industry leaders at Cloudflare Connect to explore how seamless networking, security, and innovation can transform your IT ecosystem. Gain insights, connect with experts, and discover the future of digital infrastructure.

rightHalf.entityTitle: Cloudflare events hub - Connect London image

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
<style>
  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .row{
    margin-left: -18px;
    margin-right: -18px;
  }

  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row{
    row-gap: 32px;
    column-gap: 32px;
  }

  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l{
    padding: 0;
    width: calc(33.33% - 21.33px);

    @media (max-width: 767px){
      width: 100%;
    }
  }

  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l .container {
    height: 100%;
    padding: 0 !important;
  }

  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l .container .row {
    height: 100%;
  }

  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l .container .row .col-lg-12 {
    height: 100%;
  }

 #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l .container .rich-text-renderer {
    padding: 16px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    height: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 12px 0px #0000001F;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    min-height: 172px;
  } 

  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l .container .rich-text-renderer p:last-of-type{
    display: flex;
    flex-grow: 1;
    align-items: end;
  }
  #schedule-events-tabs .container .row .col-lg-12:nth-child(3) .row .bg-white.pb7.pb7-ns.pb7-m.pb11-l.pt4.pt4-ns.pt4-m.pt10-l .container .rich-text-renderer p:first-of-type .richtext-bold-container {
    color: #FF6633;
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    font-weight: 500 !important;
  } 
  #featured-event .col-lg-6 {
    flex: 0 0 40%;
    max-width: 40%;
  }
  #featured-event .col-lg-6:last-of-type {
    flex: 0 0 60%;
    max-width: 60%;

    @media (max-width: 767px){
      flex: 0 0 100%;
      max-width: 100%;
    }
  }
</style>
